## ListOptions class

Options passed to any operation that requests paginated lists

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class ListOptions extends BaseOptions 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [BaseOptions](./api-common.baseoptions.md)

|  [start?](./api-common.listoptions.start.md) |  | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Continuation token that indicates start of the result set to be returned |
